questions.question_text: What types of tasks are specific to the Audit module? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Answer: C. ComplianceScoreCalculator
Explanation: i am really sceptical on this one, ComplianceScoreCalculator script include just calls the ComplianceScoreCalculatorBase script include, so it's the ComplianceScoreCalculatorBase that does the calculations....
Source: DPI, ComplianceScoreCalculator sys_script_include

Selected Answer: C
C - ComplianceScoreCalculator

questions.question_text: Which Script include can be modified to change how the compliance scores roll up?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AE
A. sn_risk_advanced_risk_assessment_methodology
E. sn_risk_advanced_factor

Tested in PDI

Selected Answer: AE
Answer:
 A. sn_risk_advanced_nsk_assessment_methodotogy
 E. sn_risk_advanced_factor
Explanation: GRC: Advanced Risk contains 62 tables, which includes 
 - Risk Assessment Methodology[sn_risk_advanced_risk_assessment_methodology] | A.
 - Factor[sn_risk_advanced_factor] | C.
sn_risk_advanced_crltena, sn_risk_advanced_definition doesn't exist, while Risk Response Task[sn_risk_response_task] exists under GRC: Risk Management application

questions.question_text: What are primary tables for the GRC Advanced Risk application scope? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Control Objective (sn_compliance_policy_statement), Citation (sn_compliance_citation) and Risk Statement (sn_risk_statement) are extensions of content (sn_grc_content)

Please refer the GRC table architecture

Selected Answer: AC
AC are correct

Selected Answer: AC
AC are correct. Risk statement, Policy statement, and Citation extend the Content table
AC are correct. Risk statement, Policy statement, and Citation extend the Content table

questions.question_text: Which tables extend the Content (sn_grc_content) table? (Choose two.)
Controls are automatically moved to which state from the attestation phase?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer: B. Review
Explanation: control lifecycle is Draft > Attest > Review > Monitor > Retired, after attestation, it's in the review state
Source: PDI, nav menu sn_compliance_control.do

Selected Answer: B
true text book p 134
